title: Round the twist: the gum-leaf war
creator_credit: Australian Children's Television Foundation, Antonia Barnard, Steve Steve Jodrell and Paul Jennings
brief_description: Dreaming that she has a huge nose, Linda takes her problems to Aunt Tuneless’ shack in the mountains where a war is in progress. People can inflict their own ailments on others by playing the gum leaves from a twisted tree.
creator_credit_for_label: Australian Children’s Television Foundation, Antonia Barnard, Steve Steve Jodrell and Paul Jennings
description: Dreaming that she has a huge nose, Linda takes her problems to Aunt Tuneless’ shack in the mountains where a war is in progress. People can inflict their own ailments on others by playing the gum leaves from a twisted tree.
